items.summary: Update the Login page session-initialization failure UI so the user-facing copy matches the user request: show the failure message as "Session Setup failed, kindly refresh it." and update the primary action label to a refresh-oriented label (e.g., "Refresh" / "Refresh this") while keeping the existing reload behavior unchanged.

Rearrange (move) the dashboard panels in both Admin Dashboard and Agent Dashboard by changing the tab order and layout so all panels are clearly reachable and appear in the requested arrangement, without removing any existing panels or changing their functionality.
